backend/main.mo: Defines product, cart, order, and user profile types and implements order creation, retrieval, and profile management with access control checks.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module exporting a no‑op run function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation, cart logic, product filtering, preferences, reactions, and integrating backend-backed orders.
frontend/src/components/AddProductDialog: Dialog component allowing users to create custom products with validation for fields and image URLs.
frontend/src/components/CartView.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, subtotal calculation, and empty-cart fallback.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutView.tsx: Handles checkout form, payment input formatting, validation, and order submission.
frontend/src/components/FavoritesView.ts: Shows favorited products with options to view details or remove favorites, plus empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/OrderConfirmatio: Displays order confirmation details including items, subtotal, and a continue-shopping button.
frontend/src/components/OrderHistoryView: Fetches and displays user order history with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetails.t: Shows detailed product info with image gallery, actions for cart, likes, favorites, and sharing.
frontend/src/components/ProductImageLigh: Lightbox modal for viewing product images with keyboard navigation and scroll locking.
frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx: Product list with search and price filters plus actions like view, add, like, favorite, and share.
frontend/src/components/SportsShopHeader: Sticky shop header with navigation to home, favorites, orders, and cart with counts.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Static seeded product catalog defining product interface and sample items with images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity with auto‑refresh on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroImagePreferenc: Stores and retrieves the selected hero image option in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks for fetching user orders and creating new orders via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductReactions.t: Manages localStorage‑backed like and favorite reactions for products.
React hook managing user-added products with localStorage persistence and unique ID generation, merging them with seeded products.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/orders.ts: Converts cart items to backend format, computes totals, and submits orders through the backend actor.
frontend/src/lib/productShare.ts: Builds shareable product URLs and uses Web Share API or clipboard as fallback to share product details.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project state, implemented features, and architectural notes.
